data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Kanpur Dehat.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kanpur Dehat, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Kanpur Dehat, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 19,758 believers living in Kanpur Dehat, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Kanpur Dehat to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jat Dehia (Hindu traditions) people is yours.
Jesus, help the church in the county of Kanpur Dehat to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Kanpur Dehat, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Kanpur Dehat, Uttar Pradesh, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

location.name: Kanpur Dehat
location.people_groups_list: Jat Deswal, Gadaria Dhingar, Lakhera, Gadaria (Hindu traditions), Karwal
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jat Deswal (74,000), Gadaria Dhingar (1,188,000), Lakhera (189,000), Gadaria (Hindu traditions) (6,571,000), Karwal (8,000)
